title: How do I get LiveXP on onto a UFD and make bootable?

forumNotes.author: GiveABoot
forumNotes.content:
I've been reading the manual and threads and this seems to be an overlooked topic.   

1) How do I get my LiveXP build onto a UFD (USB Flash Drive) ?   

2) How do I make the UFD bootable ? and  

3) What is the best project to download for LiveXP onto UFD ?  

My PC **will**boot from UFD ![:D](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png) , I tried it with BartPE.  

Thank you in advance for clear instructions. ![:D](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png)

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
> I've been reading the manual and threads and this seems to be an overlooked topic.   
>
> 1) How do I get my LiveXP build onto a UFD (USB Flash Drive) ?   
>
> 2) How do I make the UFD bootable ? and  
>
> 3) What is the best project to download for LiveXP onto UFD ?

Has this been overlooked? :wink:  

Maybe you read some other thread or manual.  

Try reading this:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=4111](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=4111 "External link")  

> Newcomer's Tutorial - LiveXP with BootSDI!  
> .....  
> **More Advanced Options**   
>
> **Setting up a UFD boot disk**   
> ......

![:D](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png)  

The app/method by **wimb** will give you however more formatting options for the USB stick.  

![:D](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png)  

jaclaz

forumNotes.author: GiveABoot
forumNotes.content: Wimb \& Jaclaz: Thank you to both of you, I will read the links you kindly provided!
